channel.title: Urgent help on this error (Crashes my server)
channel.description:
[code] java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: unable to create new native thread at java.lang.Thread.start0(Native Method) at java.lang.Thread.start(Unknown Source) at server.util.MadTurnipConnection.addDonateItems(MadTurnipConnection.ja va:68) at server.model.players.Client.initialize(Client.java:1058) at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:286) at server.Server$2.execute(Server.java:237) at server.event.Task.tick(Task.java:104) at server.event.TaskScheduler.run(TaskScheduler.java:97) at java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRunAndReset(Unknown Source)
at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.runAndReset(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor$ScheduledFutureTask. access$301(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor$ScheduledFutureTask. run(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
[/code]
Can anyone help me please. It keeps crashing my server after a while. I have no idea why it's doing this and I seriously need help.
I think it has to do with "Martin's Auto Donation System"

item.title: Urgent help on this error (Crashes my server)
item.dc:creator: @Kingen50cent Kingen50cent
item.description:
@Kingen50cent wrote:

java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: unable to create new native thread
        at java.lang.Thread.start0(Native Method)
        at java.lang.Thread.start(Unknown Source)
        at server.util.MadTurnipConnection.addDonateItems(MadTurnipConnection.ja
va:68)
        at server.model.players.Client.initialize(Client.java:1058)
        at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:286)
        at server.Server$2.execute(Server.java:237)
        at server.event.Task.tick(Task.java:104)
        at server.event.TaskScheduler.run(TaskScheduler.java:97)
        at java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Unknown Source)
        at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRunAndReset(Unknown Source)

  at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.runAndReset(Unknown Source)
        at java.util.concurrent.ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor$ScheduledFutureTask.
access$301(Unknown Source)
        at java.util.concurrent.ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor$ScheduledFutureTask.
run(Unknown Source)
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source)
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

Can anyone help me please. It keeps crashing my server after a while. I have no idea why it’s doing this and I seriously need help.

I think it has to do with “Martin’s Auto Donation System”
